      • getItemFromCursor

        protected Message getItemFromCursor(android.database.Cursor cursor)
        Description copied from class: AbstractReadOnlyDAO

        Implement this method to provide cursor-to-entity mapping.

        Here is the standard idiom for entity mapping: 

           public class MyDataDAO extends AbstractReadOnlyDAO {

     ...

     protected MyData getItemFromCursor(final Cursor cursor) {
         MyData myData = new MyData();
         myData.setInteger(getInteger(cursor, Columns.INTEGER_COLUMN));
         myData.setString(getString(cursor, Columns.STRING_COLUMN));
         return myData;
     }

   }
        Specified by:
        getItemFromCursor in class AbstractReadOnlyDAO<Message>
        Parameters:
        cursor - cursor
        Returns:
        non-null data entity.

      • toContentValues

        protected android.content.ContentValues toContentValues(Message entity)
        Description copied from class: AbstractIdentifyDAO

        Implement that method to map your data entity to ContentValues.

        Here is the standard idiom for entity mapping: 

           public class MyDataDAO extends AbstractIdentifyDAO {

     ...

     protected ContentValues toContentValues(final MyData entity) {
         ContentValues values = new ContentValues();
         values.put(Columns._ID, entity.getId());
         values.put(Columns.INTEGER_COLUMN, entity.getInteger());
         values.put(Columns.STRING_COLUMN, entity.getString());
         return values;
     }

   }
        Specified by:
        toContentValues in class AbstractIdentifyDAO<java.lang.Long,Message>
        Parameters:
        entity - a data entity.
        Returns:
        an column/value pair.
